title: Make game start super easy with spikes and long platforms
description:
Modified the game to start super easy for beginners:
- Initial obstacles now alternate between spikes and long platforms
- Jump platforms available from level 0 (not level 1)
- Platforms are extra long (100-150px) in early levels for easier landing
- Blocks delayed until level 3
- Platform heights capped at 60-100px (removed 120px) for easier jumping
acceptance_criteria: Game should start with only spikes and long platforms that are easy to jump on. Difficulty should gradually increase as the player progresses.

title: Fix platform collision detection for proper landing
description:
Fixed issues preventing player from landing on jump platforms:
- Added terminal velocity (maxFallSpeed: 20) to prevent tunneling
- Improved collision detection with previous position checking
- Increased vertical tolerance from 10 to 25 pixels
- Added 5-pixel tolerance above platforms
- Fixed platform edge detection when walking off
acceptance_criteria: Player should be able to reliably jump onto and land on yellow platforms without passing through them or dying

title: Fix broken collision detection for spikes and platform undersides
description:
Fixed critical collision detection issues:

1. Platform collision logic completely rewritten:
   - Now properly detects hitting platforms from below/sides (causes death)
   - Only safe when landing on top with downward velocity
   - Added safety check for players already on platforms

2. Spike collision improvements:
   - Added narrower collision box (20px instead of 30px) to match triangle shape
   - Centered collision box with 5px offset
   - Applied to both regular and simple spike generation

3. Debug mode added:
   - Set debugMode = true to visualize collision boxes
   - Green box shows player hitbox
   - Red boxes show obstacle hitboxes

4. Fixed isColliding function to support custom collision boxes
acceptance_criteria:
All obstacles should have proper collision detection:
- Spikes kill on any contact
- Platform tops are safe to land on
- Platform undersides and sides kill on contact
- Blocks and other obstacles kill on any contact

title: Add auto-reloading development server
description:
Created auto-reloading development server scripts for better DX:

1. dev_server.py - Basic auto-reload using built-in Python libraries
   - Watches .html, .js, .css, .json files
   - Restarts server on changes
   - No external dependencies required

2. dev_server_watchdog.py - Advanced version using watchdog library
   - More efficient file watching
   - Better performance for large projects
   - Requires: pip install watchdog

3. package.json - Added npm scripts for convenience
   - npm start / npm run dev - runs dev_server.py
   - npm run dev:watchdog - runs watchdog version
   - npm run dev:node - uses nodemon

4. Updated CLAUDE.md with new commands
acceptance_criteria: Development server should automatically restart when source files are modified, providing instant feedback during development

title: Fix spike hitboxes positioned below ground
description:
Fixed spike collision boxes that were incorrectly positioned below the ground level:

1. Updated spike y position to be at the TOP of the spike (groundY - 40) instead of at ground level
2. Added groundY property to store the actual ground position for drawing
3. Modified drawSpike to use the stored groundY for the base and obstacle.y for the tip
4. Applied fix to both generateSimpleSpike and generateObstacle functions

The collision box now correctly matches the visible spike triangle above the ground.
acceptance_criteria: Spike collision boxes should be positioned above the ground, matching the visual spike triangle exactly

title: Generate audio files for game sounds
description:
Created audio generation system for Beanie Dash:

1. Created audio_generator.html - Web-based tool with preview/download
2. Created generate_audio_simple.py - Python script (no dependencies)
3. Generated three WAV audio files:
   - jump.wav (17KB) - Quick upward sweep sound
   - death.wav (70KB) - Descending glitchy sound
   - background.wav (705KB) - 8-second synthwave loop

4. Updated index.html to support WAV as fallback format

Audio features:
- Jump: 200-1000Hz frequency sweep with decay
- Death: 800Hz descending with glitch effects
- Background: 120 BPM synthwave with bass, drums, and arp
acceptance_criteria: Game should have working sound effects for jump, death, and background music that play appropriately during gameplay

title: Add password protection to game
description:
Added password protection to Beanie Dash game:

1. Created password entry screen that appears before game
2. Password: "poop.pop.cool"
3. Uses sessionStorage to remember authentication during session
4. Added visual feedback:
   - Success: plays jump sound and shows game
   - Failure: plays death sound, shakes input, shows error
5. Styled with neon theme matching game aesthetic
6. Added hint: "What's brown, rhymes with loop, and sounds cool?"

Features:
- Enter key submits password
- Password persists for browser session
- Animated lock icon and shake effects
- Error messages with retry capability
acceptance_criteria: Game should require password "poop.pop.cool" to play, with session persistence and good UX feedback
